attributes.action: Introduce a Fair Trade Price paid to farmers for Milk
attributes.background: As a mother, daughter & wife I appeal to the public & government alike to help the plight of the dairy farmers by introducing a fair trade minimum price payable to the farmer. Milk prices are so low many farmers & businesses linked to the Dairy industry are facing extreme hardship if not bankruptcy.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105450

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
